scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn clean && yarn build:bos:mainnet && yarn push:bos:mainnet && yarn deploy:mweb:mainnet
scripts.deploy:testnet: yarn clean && yarn build:bos:testnet && yarn push:bos:testnet && yarn deploy:mweb:testnet
scripts.build:bos:mainnet: mkdir -p build/src && cp -r src/widgets/ build/src && find build/src -type f | xargs -I '{}' sed -i '' 's/${REPL_ACCOUNT}/bos.dapplets.near/g' {}
scripts.build:bos:testnet: mkdir -p build/src && cp -r src/widgets/ build/src && find build/src -type f | xargs -I '{}' sed -i '' 's/${REPL_ACCOUNT}/bos.dapplets.testnet/g' {}
scripts.push:bos:mainnet: cd build && bos components deploy bos.dapplets.near sign-as bos.dapplets.near network-config mainnet sign-with-legacy-keychain send
scripts.push:bos:testnet: cd build && bos components deploy bos.dapplets.testnet sign-as bos.dapplets.testnet network-config testnet sign-with-legacy-keychain send
scripts.diff:mainnet: cd build && bos components diff bos.dapplets.near network-config mainnet
scripts.diff:testnet: cd build && bos components diff bos.dapplets.testnet network-config testnet
